entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 21. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
